analyzed: gang gis mnyam dgar byang chub dam pa thugs su chud //
translated: By whom the supreme enlightenment of equanimity was realized,

original: gang gis w'a r'a na s'ir chos kyi 'khor lo bskor //
analyzed: gang gis w'a r'a na s'ir chos kyi 'khor lo bskor //
translated: By whom the wheel of Dharma was turned in VƒÅrƒÅ·πáasƒ´,

original: s'a la'i tshal du mya ngan 'das gyur de bstod pa //
analyzed: s'a la'i tshal du mya ngan 'das gyur de bstod pa //
translated: I praise him, who has passed into nirvƒÅ·πáa in the SƒÅla grove.

original: kyi hud snying rje ldan mgon rgyal ba'i sdig pa zhi //
analyzed: kyi hud snying rje ldan mgon rgyal ba'i sdig pa zhi //
translated: Alas, O protector with compassion, the sin of the Victorious One is purified.üîΩAlas, O most excellent one with a pleasant face, dear to sentient beings,

original: kyi hud sems can mnyes gshin kha los sgyur bzang mchog / kyi hud ded dpon zhi ba'i lam gyur ston pa po //
analyzed: kyi hud sems can mnyes gshin kha los sgyur bzang mchog / kyi hud ded dpon zhi ba'i lam gyur ston pa po //
translated: Alas, O guide who has become the path of the peaceful captain,

original: kyi hud sdug dang mi sdug thugs snyoms 'jig rten gnyen //
analyzed: kyi hud sdug dang mi sdug thugs snyoms 'jig rten gnyen //
translated: Alas, O friend of the world with an impartial mind towards the pleasant and unpleasant.

original: kyi hud mun nag gis bsgribs mig can 'jig rten spyan ;
analyzed: kyi hud mun nag gis bsgribs mig can 'jig rten spyan ;
translated: Alas, O eye of the world, for those whose eyes are obscured by darkness.

original: / kyi hud thub chen gru yis 'jig rten sgrol mdzad pa //
analyzed: / kyi hud thub chen gru yis 'jig rten sgrol mdzad pa //
translated: ‚ÄúAlas, great Sage, you who liberate the world with the ship of Dharma,

original: kyi hud s'a la'i tshal du ci phyir mya ngan 'das //üîΩkhyod zhal zla rgyas pad+ma kha phye 'dra ba dang // autpala rgyas pa lta bu'i spyan ldan sku nyid kyang //
analyzed: kyi hud s'a la'i tshal du ci phyir mya ngan 'das // khyod zhal zla rgyas pad+ma kha phye 'dra ba dang // autpala rgyas pa lta bu'i spyan ldan sku nyid kyang //
translated: why do you pass into nirvƒÅ·πáa in the grove of SƒÅla trees?üîΩYour face is like a full moon, your eyes like opened lotuses and blue lilies,

original: gser gyi ri 'dra mtshan rnams rdzogs pa sus mthong 'gyur //
analyzed: gser gyi ri 'dra mtshan rnams rdzogs pa sus mthong 'gyur //
translated: and your body is like a golden mountain, complete with the major marks.

original: kyi hud 'od 'dra'i gzugs mchog 'di ma mthong bas sdug bsngal lo //
analyzed: kyi hud 'od 'dra'i gzugs mchog 'di ma mthong bas sdug bsngal lo //
translated: Alas, I am suffering from not seeing this supreme form, which is like a mass of light.

original: sngon tshe rgya chen lam gyi rang bzhin gzings bcas te //
analyzed: sngon tshe rgya chen lam gyi rang bzhin gzings bcas te //
translated: In the past, you prepared the ship of the vast path

original: nyid kyi don dang 'gro ba chen po'i gzhan don mdzad //
analyzed: nyid kyi don dang 'gro ba chen po'i gzhan don mdzad //
translated: for your own benefit and for the benefit of many beings.

original: srog chags brgya phrag mang po thar dang mtho ris bkod //
analyzed: srog chags brgya phrag mang po thar dang mtho ris bkod //
translated: You established many hundreds of living beings in liberation and the higher realms.

original: kyi hud mi rtag me tshogs dag gis zad mthar gyur //üîΩdag pa'i rdzing yangs tshul khrims chu yis bsil bar bltams //
analyzed: kyi hud mi rtag me tshogs dag gis zad mthar gyur // dag pa'i rdzing yangs tshul khrims chu yis bsil bar bltams //
translated: Alas, you have been consumed by the mass of the fire of impermanence.üîΩThe vast pond of purity is filled with the cool water of discipline,

original: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos kyi chu srin dur pas khyab //
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos kyi chu srin dur pas khyab //
translated: and the pond of the Dharma of the perfect Buddha is covered with the lotuses of the arhats.

original: dge slong dam pa gzhan tshogs brgya yis nye bar bsten //
analyzed: dge slong dam pa gzhan tshogs brgya yis nye bar bsten //
translated: He was attended by a hundred other holy monks.

original: kyi hud bde 'gro'i 'bab stegs skam la bdag phyag 'tshal //
analyzed: kyi hud bde 'gro'i 'bab stegs skam la bdag phyag 'tshal //
translated: Alas, I bow down to the dried-up ford of the happy realms!

original: spyod pa'i rtsa ba brtan zhing dran pa'i sdong pos mdzes //
analyzed: spyod pa'i rtsa ba brtan zhing dran pa'i sdong pos mdzes //
translated: The root of conduct is firm, adorned with the trunk of mindfulness,

original: byang chub yan lag me tog kha bye bzod yal ga / ngo tsha'i 'dab rgyas bdud rtsi 'bras bus mchog g-yur za //
analyzed: byang chub yan lag me tog kha bye bzod yal ga / ngo tsha'i 'dab rgyas bdud rtsi 'bras bus mchog g-yur za //
translated: The branches of patience are the flowers of the limbs of enlightenment, the fruit of nectar is supreme.

original: kyi hud bde gshegs shing 'gye la bdag phyag 'tshal //
analyzed: kyi hud bde gshegs shing 'gye la bdag phyag 'tshal //
translated: Alas, I bow down to the felled tree of the Sugata!

original: rdul med mya ngan 'das pa nam mkha'i ngos legs bzhugs //
analyzed: rdul med mya ngan 'das pa nam mkha'i ngos legs bzhugs //
translated: The stainless one sits in the sky of nirvana,

original: @204a * // slob ma tshul khrims legs gnas dkyil 'khor skar ma can //
analyzed: @204a * // slob ma tshul khrims legs gnas dkyil 'khor skar ma can //
translated: The disciples are well-placed in the mandala of ethics, like stars,

original: 'phags lam skyed byed blo mig yid 'ong zla zer can //
analyzed: 'phags lam skyed byed blo mig yid 'ong zla zer can //
translated: The beautiful moonbeams of the mind produce the noble path.

original: kyi hud bde gshegs zla ba nub la bdag phyag 'tshal //
analyzed: kyi hud bde gshegs zla ba nub la bdag phyag 'tshal //
translated: Alas, I bow down to the setting moon of the Sugata!

original: gti mug mun nag sel mdzad yon tan 'od zer ldan //
analyzed: gti mug mun nag sel mdzad yon tan 'od zer ldan //
translated: The one endowed with the light rays of qualities, dispelling the darkness of ignorance,

original: gdul bya'i tshogs kyi rdzing gi pad+ma kha 'byed cing //
analyzed: gdul bya'i tshogs kyi rdzing gi pad+ma kha 'byed cing //
translated: Opens the lotus flowers of the assembly of disciples.

original: lta ba drug cu rtsa gnyis dri ma'i 'dam skems mdzad //
analyzed: lta ba drug cu rtsa gnyis dri ma'i 'dam skems mdzad //
translated: You dried up the swamp of the sixty-two views.

original: kyi hud bde gshegs nyi ma nub la bdag phyag 'tshal //
analyzed: kyi hud bde gshegs nyi ma nub la bdag phyag 'tshal //
translated: Alas, I pay homage to you, Sugata, as the sun sets.

original: byams mchog sku mnga' 'phags pa'i bden bzhi'i zhabs dang ldan //
analyzed: byams mchog sku mnga' 'phags pa'i bden bzhi'i zhabs dang ldan //
translated: You have the supreme body of love and the feet of the four noble truths,

original: zhi gnas lhag mthong lha yi spyan gnyis dang ldan zhing //
analyzed: zhi gnas lhag mthong lha yi spyan gnyis dang ldan zhing //
translated: You have the two eyes of the gods of ≈õamatha and vipa≈õyanƒÅ,

original: dad pa rab skyed rnam dag grol ba'i 'gros kyis bzhud //
analyzed: dad pa rab skyed rnam dag grol ba'i 'gros kyis bzhud //
translated: You walk with the gait of liberation, generating supreme faith and purity.

original: kyi hud bde gshegs glang chen zhir gshegs bdag phyag 'tshal //
analyzed: kyi hud bde gshegs glang chen zhir gshegs bdag phyag 'tshal //
translated: Alas, I pay homage to you, Sugata, as you depart to the peace of the elephant.

original: sems can med pa sgra sgrogs mu stegs ri dags 'joms //
analyzed: sems can med pa sgra sgrogs mu stegs ri dags 'joms //
translated: You roar the sound of the nonexistence of sentient beings, conquering the deer-like tƒ´rthikas,

original: ngo mtshar ral pa'i tshogs mnga' 'phyang bas sku la brgyan //
analyzed: ngo mtshar ral pa'i tshogs mnga' 'phyang bas sku la brgyan //
translated: You are adorned with the hanging mass of your wondrous mane,

original: shes rab mche ba rab rno tshul khrims dge ba'i zhabs //
analyzed: shes rab mche ba rab rno tshul khrims dge ba'i zhabs //
translated: You have the sharp fangs of wisdom and the feet of virtuous discipline.

original: kyi hud bde gshegs seng ge zhir gshegs bdag phyag 'tshal //
analyzed: kyi hud bde gshegs seng ge zhir gshegs bdag phyag 'tshal //
translated: Alas, I pay homage to you, Sugata, as you depart to the peace of the lion.

original: sangs rgyas mya ngan yongs 'das khyod la bdag bstod pas //
analyzed: sangs rgyas mya ngan yongs 'das khyod la bdag bstod pas //
translated: Through my praise of you, Sugata, who has passed into parinirvƒÅ·πáa,

original: bsod nams rgya chen 'bras bu mtha' yas gang bsags pa //
analyzed: bsod nams rgya chen 'bras bu mtha' yas gang bsags pa //
translated: I accumulate the vast merit of infinite fruition.

original: des ni bdag gis gnas mchog dam pa thob gyur nas //
analyzed: des ni bdag gis gnas mchog dam pa thob gyur nas //
translated: Having attained the highest, most sacred state,üîΩmay I benefit beings just as you have.

original: khyed 'dra kho nar 'gro la phan pa bgyid gyur cig / sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la bstod pa slob dpon chen po dpal ldan chos kyi grags pas mdzad pa rdzogs so//
analyzed: khyed 'dra kho nar 'gro la phan pa bgyid gyur cig / sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la bstod pa slob dpon chen po dpal ldan chos kyi grags pas mdzad pa rdzogs so//
translated: This concludes the praise of the Buddha's parinirvƒÅ·πáa composed by the great master glorious Dharmakƒ´rti.
